name: Inoculation combat misinformation in China
description: This dataset, sourced from Open Science Framework (OSF) for the purpose of replication, contains information on respondent demographics and measures of efficacy for misinformation education in both game-based and graphic-based strategies.
funder: Ministry of Education, Humanities and Social Sciences project

variableMeasured.name: group
variableMeasured.description: Assigned number for control, game-based, graphics-based groups (1-3)

variableMeasured.unitText: Likert scale (1 = totally not accurate, 5 = very accurate)
variableMeasured.name: fake_dis_pre

variableMeasured.unitText: Likert scale (1 = totally not accurate, 5 = very accurate)
variableMeasured.name: fake_shar_pre
variableMeasured.description: Fake headlines pre-test willingness to share score

variableMeasured.unitText: Likert scale (1 = totally not accurate, 5 = very accurate)
variableMeasured.name: real_dis_pre

variableMeasured.unitText: Likert scale (1 = totally not accurate, 5 = very accurate)
variableMeasured.name: real_shar_pre
variableMeasured.description: Real headlines pre-test willingness to share score

variableMeasured.unitText: Likert scale (1 = totally not accurate, 5 = very accurate)
variableMeasured.name: fake_dis_post

variableMeasured.unitText: Likert scale (1 = totally not accurate, 5 = very accurate)
variableMeasured.name: fake_shar_post
variableMeasured.description: Fake headlines post-test willingness to share score using Likert scale

variableMeasured.unitText: Likert scale (1 = totally not accurate, 5 = very accurate)
variableMeasured.name: real_dis_post

variableMeasured.unitText: Likert scale (1 = totally not accurate, 5 = very accurate)
variableMeasured.name: real_shar_post
variableMeasured.description: Real headlines post-test willingness to share score

variableMeasured.unitText: Likert scale (1 = totally not accurate, 5 = very accurate)
variableMeasured.name: fake_dis_follow
variableMeasured.description: Fake headlines follow-up test credibility score

variableMeasured.unitText: Likert scale (1 = totally not accurate, 5 = very accurate)
variableMeasured.name: fake_shar_folow
variableMeasured.description: Fake headlines follow-up test willingness to share score

variableMeasured.unitText: Likert scale (1 = totally not accurate, 5 = very accurate)
variableMeasured.name: real_dis_follow
variableMeasured.description: Real headlines follow-up test credibility score

variableMeasured.unitText: Likert scale (1 = totally not accurate, 5 = very accurate)
variableMeasured.name: real_shar_folow
variableMeasured.description: Real headlines follow-up test willingness to share score

variableMeasured.name: Region
variableMeasured.description: Demographic: region (1-29 for each Chinese province represented in study)
